name: Hayes Creek Country Club, Inc. v. Central Penn Quarry Stripping and Construction Company, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Hayes Creek Country Club, Inc. v. Central Penn Quarry Stripping & Construction Co.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Mtrsmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell would reverse and enter judgment n.o.v. for defendant.
parties: Hayes Creek Country Club, Inc. v. Central Penn Quarry Stripping and Construction Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
Judgment affirmed on opinion of President Judge Campbell, specially presiding.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell would reverse and enter judgment n.o.v. for defendant.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: John P. Thomas, with Mm Boyd S. Walker, and Walker é Walker, for appellant.
Roger N. Nanovic, with him Albert F. Maier, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Hayes Creek Country Club, Inc. v. Central Penn Quarry Stripping and Construction Company, Appellant.
Argued April 23, 1962.
Before Bell, C. J., Mtrsmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.
May 21, 1962:
John P. Thomas, with Mm Boyd S. Walker, and Walker é Walker, for appellant.
Roger N. Nanovic, with him Albert F. Maier, for appellee.
